core:processNote.core:description: Ensure there is always a split

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: Process is complete, basket balance is zero.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: We have completely split bill tendering but the basket balance is not zero. If there are still unpaid splits, force the user back to the start again. Otherwise go to normal tendering to complete.
We have completely split bill tendering but the basket balance is not zero. If there are still unpaid splits, force the user back to the start again. Otherwise go to normal tendering to complete.

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: A partial refund has completed but further refunds are required (not used).

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: We have completely split bill tendering but the basket balance is not zero. If there are still unpaid splits, force the user back to the start again. Otherwise go to normal tendering to complete.
